text:
Ya, Pasti tak pernah kecewa, ini kesekian kali saya menginap di Oakwood
Dan ada Ibu Damai yang selalu siap membantu saya menyiapkan kamar dan segala keperluan saya sebelum hari check-in

Walau sedang musim hujan, tetap terasa hangat

View baik, jaringan internet gratisnya lancar

Lokasi baik, ada ranch market yang jaraknya beberapa langkah dari lift
Banyak kafe dan resto juga disekitar
Bahkan di Belagio, beberapa langkah dari depan hotel, ada sevel yang buka 24 jam
No worry to hungry...

Berbeda dengan hotel apartemen lainnya yang menu seadanya saja
Pelayanan di resto juga sangat baik & prima
Pool cukup baik, poolside dengan pemandangan fantastik

Permintaan late check-out dikabulkan oleh saudari Krista
Sampai saya hendak pulang juga dibantu oleh beliau masalah kendaraan & free parking

Sebelumnya saya cuma kasih 4 bintang, kali ini patut 5 Bintang buat Oakwood
Keep the good work

title: Apartement dikawasan kuningan

text:
Tiba di hotel, ada sekuritinya, tapi sayangnya tidak ada conciergenya, jadi bersusah payah membuka pintu hotel dengan barang bawaan yang berat
Sehari sebelumnya saya sudah menelepon mau early check in pukul 13.00, sudah OK, tapi kenyataannya saat check in dengan saudara kendid pukul 17.00 kamar saya di lantai 10 belum ready, akhirnya dipindah ke lantai 5, cukup kecewa, padahal memiliki harapan dapat kamar yang tinggi
Kamar cukup luas, ada dapur, bedroom utama, living room dan study room, kami manfaatkan dapurnya untuk memasak spagetti, dan perlengkapan di dapur ternyata cukup lengkap
sayangnya executive room yang kami tempati, yang katanya berkapasitas 4 orang tersebut hanya memiliki 2 botol air mineral komplimentari, 2 buah handuk dan 1 buat sikat gigi saja, mungkin pihak manajemen berharap tamunya akan share 1 sikat gigi satu sama lain, cukup pelit..
Sofa kamar saya di 507 sangat empuk, living roomnya menyenangkan utk berkumpul bersama saudara, free wifi dengan jaringan koneksi yang baik.
Lokasi hotel ini sangat strategis, segala jenis hiburan malam, minimarket, semua ada di sekitar hotel dan dapat diraih hanya dalam hitungan menit dengan berjalan kaki.
Sarapan kurang variatif, bagi anda yang suka menikmati berbagai jenis makanan, hotel ini kurang cocok untuk anda, sangat terbatas dan terkesan apa adanya..
Kolam disini bagus, nyaman dan menyenangkan, kami sangat menikmati, renang di malam dan siang hari cukup menyenangkan, beberapa sajian dari poolbarnya juga cukup enak, dengan harga terjangkau, view dari area pool juga cukup keren..
Staff di hotel ini sangat bisa diandalkan, sangat cekatan, ramah dan murah senyum, semuanya hangat, apalagi Rizty, sedikit chit chat dengannya cukup menyenangkan sambil check out..
title: Menarik...

text: Hotel dengan suasana apartemen ini menyajikan fasilitas dan kenyamanan yang luar biasa. Tempatnya elegan, rapi, dan bersih. Berlokasi di kawasan yang Mega Kuningan ini sangat cocok untuk kepentingan bisnis karena posisinya sangat strategis.
title: Terbaik...

text:
Hotel fully furnished mewah bersuasana apartemen yang menggabungkan fasilitas hotel dan kenyamanan seperti di rumah dalam satu lingkungan yang elegan dan bersih.

text: Lokasi yang sangat strategis,  ruangan yang tertata indah dan rapi serta dipadukan dengan pelayanan yang ramah, serta fasilitas lainnya,  tidak mengherankan harganya pun kompetitif.  Berbanding lurus dengan fasilitas yang kita dapatkan.
title: Perfect . . .

text: The Oakwood Apartemen di Mega Kuningnan sangat nyaman dan luas. Saya tinggal di sebuah apartemen satu kamar. Ada dapur yang baik dan ada juga restoran yang menyajikan makanan dasar. Staf Oakwood sangat ramah dan layanan sangat baik.
title: Nyaman, pelayanan yang baik

text:
Hotel / Apartemen ini berada di lokasi yang strategis, di area Mega Kuningan. Hotel ini sangat nyaman dan di lantai bawah dekat dengan Starbucks, Supermarket, Loewy, dan beberapa restoran lainnya juga beberapa Mal besar.

Kamar yang cukup luas, bersih dan nyaman interior yang modern, begitu pula dengan dapurnya dilengkapi dengan peralatan lengkap seperti pembuat kopi, microwave, kulkas, dan kompor nasi yang disediakan. Dapat juga mencuci pakaian kita sendiri.
Sangat saya rekomendasikan.
title: Hotel bagus dan Lokasi Strategis

text: Saya tinggal di sini selama dua setengah tahun, tempat yg sagat bagus apartemen dengan fasilitas hotel servis. Viewnya dari kolam renang bisa melihat ke Ritz coltan megakuningan,JW Marriot, Kariawan yang sangat baik, Sangat bagus tapi yang di sayangkan tidak ada balkon
title: Sangat bagus tetapi kurang balkon

text: 1 bedroom executive sangat memenuhi kebutuhan saya weekend lalu. Saya mengadakan surprise party untuk pasangan dan dapat menampung 12 orang tanpa merasa terlalu sempit. Perlengkapan dapur sangat lengkap, termasuk garam dan lada begitu juga sabun untuk mencuci piring. Tidak kekurangan satu apapun. Ranjang sangat nyaman, kamar mandi bersih. Tidak ada cela!
title: weekend yang menyenangkan

text:
Lokasinya bagus, pegawainya ramah, perlengkapan, keamanan, dekat ke restoran dan toko-toko. Dan kabar buruknya, seseorang pasti telah menyuruh membuat rak dua cincin di atas oven berukuran penuh, ovennya baik, raknya buruk, rak dua cincinnya bahkan tidak bisa digunakan bersamaan dengan oven. Televisi dan mesin pemutar DVD (merek Samsung) sangat rumit untuk digunakan. Satu-satunya manfaat dari pengalaman saya ini adalah bahwa saya tidak akan pernah membeli Televisi atau pemutar DVD dari merek Samsung.

Telepon, tidak usah membuang waktu Anda dengan mencoba menggunakannya, terlebih lagi perangkat telepon kecil yang berada di ruang tamu.

Terlepas dari itu, tata grahanya, kebersihannya dan dekorasinya sangat baik.

Hampir lupa, pengedap suara antar apartemen hampir tidak ada, saya bisa mendengar tetangga saya batuk di apartemen samping, dan mendapat tetangga "berisik" dari apartemen sebelah yang terdengar seolah-olah mereka berteriak dan bertengkar di kamar depan saya.
title: Pilihan peralatan yang buruk.

text: Keluarga kami mendapatkan sebuah kamar suite di Oakwood, kamarnya berlokasi di lantai 18 dimana kami bisa melihat cakrawala dari kota Jakarta. Kamarnya bagus dengan fasilitas yang modern dan kamar mandi. Staf-stafnya selalu tersenyum dan menyambut di mana saja dan kapan saja. Kami menginap di lantai yang tinggi, sehingga kami bisa merasakan suasana tenang dan melihat pemandangan yang bagus dari Jakarta. Lokasinya tidak terkalahkan dengan jarak yang dekat dengan pusat dan restoran yang bagus yang berada di sekitarnya. Kami menikmati pengalaman menginap kami di sini.
title: Pemandangan yang bagus, kamar dan lokasi yang bagus

owner_response.text:
Dear AChengLa

Many thanks for the very positive review; we are glad you enjoyed the apartment, the service, the smiling faces, the views and were able to take advantage of some of our neighbouring facilities.

Our apartments occupy the fifth to thirty eighth floor of the Oakwood Building in the relatively quiet area of the Mega Kuningan circle. The city of Jakarta is alive 24/7 but the ambient noise levels in Oakwood at night are much below many cities I have visited.
Actually all of our apartments should be considered suites because each of them have separate bedrooms mostly with en-suite bathrooms; and of course, the living/dining area comes complete with a fully equipped kitchen. 

Once again thanks for your input and hope to welcome you back to Oakwood at some future juncture.

Best regards

Oakwood GM
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Pengalamannya menyenangkan, namun beberapa hal tidak membuatku kecewa.

1) Saya menaruh jubah mandi saya di toilet setelah menggunakannya (di dalam keranjang cucian) namun keesokan harinya, jubah mandi saya belum digantikan di lemari, namun di lipat dan di tempatkan di sofa! Sudah pasti ada alasan jelas mengapa saya menaruhnya di keranjang - untuk digantikan - dan saya sangat kecewa dengan ini

2) Pada malam hari, sebelah kamar memainkan musik dari jam 10 malam sampai dengan 12 malam dan suara musiknya terdengar hingga ke kamar saya. Mungkin kedap suara yang lebih bagus bisa di pasang untuk melindungi privasi dan ketenangan dari para tamu - meskipun itu bisa juga menjadi ledakan yang besar.

3) Sarapannya meskipun memadai namun masih di bawah standar menurut saya karena minimnya pilihan.

4) 2x mengalami pemadaman listrik pada malam hari. Mungkin Oakwood bisa memasang lampu darurat di ruang tamu untuk berjaga-jaga apa bila terjadi pemadaman listrik untuk keamanan / ketenangan para tamu. Karena sedang gelap gulita dan syukurnya saya berada dekat dengan telepon genggamku dan komputer jinjing saya sedang menyala! Semoga beruntung apabila kamu sedang berada di toilet

Terlepas dari itu, menginap di sini adalah hal yang menyenangkan.
title: Hanya beberapa kekurangan kecil - namun akan kembali

owner_response.text:
Dear Oakwood Traveller

Many thanks for your valuable feedback, it is most appreciated.

I note from your comments, the following issues:-

1.  With regard to the bathrobe, we shall re-visit this aspect of our housekeeping service and ensure our Housekeeping associates receive reminder training to replace the robe in such circumstances.

2. Oakwood has Customer Service Representatives and Security personnel on duty 24/7. In the event of any form of reported disturbance, a Security Officer would have been dispatched to investigate and the “offending” room occupants would have received a call requesting them to control the volume levels. 

3. Breakfast selection – all input on dish variety is welcomed; if you have time please let us know specifically which items would have lead to a “more complete” impression (customerservice.cozmojakarta@oakwoodasia.com )

4. The Oakwood building is equipped with two large diesel powered generators which can assume 100% normal load capacity. On the night in question I, too was sitting on my couch in my Oakwood apartment. The main supply was cut due to a Transformer fire in a PLN (Jakarta electricity company) sub-station. As I counted out loud, the GenSet took 23 seconds to automatically activate. When the Main Supply was restored the switch back from Gen Set to Mains was achieved in less than three seconds. The apartments are equipped with Emergency Torches and all corridors, Firewells and Public Area have Emergency lighting.

Once again your input is most valuable to us and we hope to welcome you back to Oakwood Premier Cozmo Jakarta in the not too distant future.

Best regards
Oakwood GM

owner_response.text:
Dear Michael G,

Many thanks for your kind review; your input is much appreciated.

I am very pleased you have picked up on, what I consider to be, two of the key unique aspects that differentiate Oakwood serviced apartments from hotels,

      1. The space an apartment affords you compared to a hotel; (our apartment sizings start from 70 Square metres and up!)
      2. The fact that many of the services offered by a five star hotel are also offered by an Oakwood Premier. Whilst we may not have 5 or 6 restaurants in-house; we do have the convenience of Oakroom restaurant and private in-room dining options available, in addition to approximately 9 restaurants of good quality offering a variety of cuisines within a 5 minute walking radius.

Once again thanks for the feedback and look forward to welcoming you back in due course.

Kind regards


M Hines
General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
My fiancee and I stayed here for 5 nights.
The hotel is a bit far from the airport so it took us about an hour to get there.
But once we were there everything was fine. The hotel has security all around the premises which made us feel safe and comfortable.
Our suite was huge (we booked a 2 bedroom suite). One bedroom served as a dressing room and to store our luggage.
Bed was very comfortable and clean. Pillows were also very comfortable.
The bathroom had a massive bathtub.
The kitchen in our room had all the utensils that we needed.
Our room also had a washing machine but no dryer, so not sure what the point of that is. But not a complain, just something to be aware of. Would be so much better if it had dryer as well.
The city view from our room was amazing, and at night was even better.
Food was delicious at both restaurants we visited. The breakfast buffet offered a good selection, and everyday was fresh. There is also a small grocery store just outside of the hotel, within 20 meters of the door. They also have a liquor store, and a Starbucks within the same complex. Super accessible and if you're just there to relax, then this is probably the best place to stay at.
The swimming pool was always clean and well-kept. And the best part was that we could order drinks and chill there for awhile.
Staff was always friendly & housekeeping was excellent.
To this day, this is still one of the best hotels we've stayed at in all the holidays we've had so far.
title: Great and spacious rooms.

owner_response.text:
Dear benmj2017,

Many thanks for your comprehensive review!

It sounds as if you have taken full advantage of what the Oakwood Premier and it's surrounds have to offer.

I am very glad you enjoyed your stay.

Our washing machines are automatic machines with wash and spin cycles. After high speed spinning the clothes can be hung on the rooms hangers; the bathroom towel rails or a request can be made to housekeeping to provide a purpose built clothes dryer which will allow the clothes to dry thoroughly. A full size ironing board and steam iron are also part of the apartment's comprehensive inventory.

Look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future. Keep on reviewing (whether good or bad) and both customer and hotelier can understand thoroughly where they are going right or wrong!

Kind regards

M Hines
General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

owner_response.text:
Dear agnesrozario,

I appreciate your feedback and glad to hear you enjoyed your stay.

You have obviously discovered the well-stocked Ranch market which is only a few paces from the second entrance of the Oakwood.

According to a 2018 Global Survey, Indonesia ranks 83rd in comparative internet speeds by country with an average download speed of 5.77 Mbps. At Oakwood our provider, using fibre optic cables, rates far higher than that within Indonesia, and the speeds are in the 12-16 Mbps range at peak periods when connecting through the International bandwidth. That International Bandwidth is seen as the "choking" factor and we are all hopeful that the restriction can be lifted after further investment into more sub-sea cables and network infrastructure.

Once again thanks for your feedback

Kind regards
General Manager

text:
Frankly I do not understand why this hotel/service apartment gets 5 stars rank.
They do not meet standard level in several aspects such as:

1.	There are still smoking floors and unbelievably smoking is allowed in a section of restaurant (outside).
2.	Water pressure of shower does not sufficient at all. It is too weak and very uncomfortable.
3.	Some of blinking arrow lights outside of elevators to show either going up or down do not properly work.
4.	They allow to bring a private trainer who are not guest to the gym. So certain space/equipment in the gym is occupied by them.
5.	TV picture quality is terrible. There is noise on picture of certain TV channel. Some channels are even out of signal very often.
6.	On Friday and Saturday nights, there are deep bass noisy sound until very late night. They said double glass window has been installed, but the sound terribly annoys me. I am rather insensitive person.
7.	There is very little choice and variety of food in breakfast buffet.

I really hope they can fix these very basic and critical issues to become real 5 star ranked hotel.
title: Give me a break. It cannot be a five-star hotel.

While in Jakarta for several nights, we stayed  at this apartment cause family and I didn't like staying at a small hotel for about the same money. 1) security is good in back and front of hotel, dog is there to help sniff out unwanted things. It can feel intimidating but I suspect its needed since it in an area where there are lot of embassies.

text:
Stayed here a couple of days in July 2017. This is a luxury serviced apartment hotel in central Jakarta, in the modern Mega Kuningan area, within a 5 minute walk from the Lotte Shopping Avenue mall, with restaurants, cafes, and a supermarket in the same complex downstairs, and much of central Jakarta a shortish taxi ride away. The proximity of Lotte and other things means that this is one of the few places in Jakarta where you can actually walk somewhere, with no necessity to use a car.
Our 1-bedroom apartment on the 20-something floor was very very nicely decorated, and had a fully equipped kitchen (all (!) kitchen equipment you might require when cooking!), washer/dryer. TVs and WiFi worked perfectly. We used the 2nd floor swimming pool (one end shallow and suitable for small children who cannot swim), the well-equipped gym, and also the restaurants and supermarket downstairs.
You could stay elsewhere in Jakarta: there are hotels also in connection with Plaza Indonesia / Grand Indonesia, and some other apartment hotels are of very good quality and cost less. Anyway, this offers one of the best combinations of features and price among places we have stayed in Jakarta so far.
title: excellent place for medium-term stays (1-bedroom apartment)

owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Many thanks for you positive feedback regarding your recent stay at Oakwood Jakarta.

We would certainly agree with you that our location in Jakarta is one of our assets. Jakarta is a pretty busy, bustling city but Mega Kuningan is a nice little enclave, very central but a little separated from the crowds.

I am glad that you found the apartment comfortable and equipped to your satisfaction. We believe our apartments offer a little bit extra particularly if you are staying for more than a night or two.

We look forward to welcoming you back.

Best regards,


Ian McKie
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: I spend here just for a weekend getaway. The room is tidy and clean. But the swimming pool is too small. And the swimming pool staff only gave us 2 towels, she said that 1 room can only got 2 towels. Well I booked 1 apartment with 2 bedrooms and still she only gave 2 towels. I used to stay in other Apartments and Hotels but they never limiting the towels.
title: Just average

owner_response.text:
Dear Guest 

Thank you for the feedback following your recent stay at Oakwood Jakarta. 

I am sorry that certain aspects of your stay did not meet with your expectations. I am very pleased to hear that you you found our apartment to be clean and comfortable. Given that we are a serviced apartment complex, rather than a hotel we feel the extra space and facilities are a real added value.

It is true that our swimming pool is a little busier than usual over the Hari Raya holiday period as we have many more families with children than is usual. Our pool is in fact 25 meters in length which is a fairly standard for a property of our size. Under normal circumstances our pool area is fairly quiet and most of our guests are mature adults who use it for exercise. The rectangular shape is good for doing laps and we do have a separate kids pool to segregate the children from the users of the main pool. Our general policy at the pool is to issue one towel to each user. We believe this practice is quite common in some hotels. 

Thank you once again for your feedback,

Best regards,

Ian McKie.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Oakwood is located in the Embassy District of Megakuningan in Jakarta. Close to City Centre, many shopping sites in walking distance. Good security, fully loaded kitchens, very clean and well kept. Great staff and well organized airport pickups from airport. I have stayed here many times and never disappointed. Well equipped gym; great outdoor pool.

text:
This is a good hotel. I stayed there with my family for about a month (last January), in two different room types (actually, these were small, but spacious furnished apartments, with an open kitchen and all necessary domestic appliances: microwave oven, washing machine, etc.). All very comfortable and neat. The location is also very good, in Mega Kuningan, with a supermarket, pharmacy and restaurants in the same complex. Pricey, but reasonable within its category. For all this, I find it highly recommendable.

However, a negative remark: there is a pool which we refrained from using because of some strange people lurking there. They did not look like hotel guests at all... and in fact, they seemed to be related to some workers that were doing a job there. This cannot be. They have to control the access to the pool.
title: Very good

owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at Oakwood Jakarta. 

I am pleased that overall you enjoyed your stay and that our location in Mega Kuningan was a benefit to you. 

During your stay with us we were carrying out some minor construction work at the pool area, so it is possible that there were contractors around at the time. Access to our pool area is tightly controlled. Lift access to the 3rd floor where our pool is located can only be achieved via a key card activation and the glass entrance doors to the pool also require key card activation. In other words, only registered guests in possession of a key would be able to access the pool. 
All contractors accessing the Oakwood site must be cleared on a daily basis by our security department who then personally escort them to their place of work. They are carefully screened coming and and going out.
There are a number of other employees who work in the pool area including cleaners, gardeners and attendants. 

Thank you once again for you feedback.

Best regards,

Ian McKie
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
My usual hotel when in Jakarta. It's more like getting an apartment but it's serviced like a hotel. You get a good size master bedroom, bathroom, a study, a small living room and small kitchen. The decor is classic-modern and the quality is somewhere between a 4 and 5 star hotel. The bathrooms are only so so and although the towels are changed daily they have this rather unpleasant smell and are far from a fluffy towel you get in a 5 star hotel. But apart from that the rooms are good and definitely spacious.
The hotel has a nice gym and good size swimming pool.
The breakfast buffet is reasonable, though for my taste I would like to see some better quality breads and some more cold food choices, I.e. better cheese and cold cuts selection.
The staff is friendly and the hotel has its own security guards with those lovely Labrador sniffer dogs,...love to given em a cuddle, not so sure how efficient they are as security dogs though :-)
The hotel location is good, but in Jakarta that really always depends where you need to be/go, as the traffic on the roads is among the worst in Asia and seemingly getting worse! Getting from one place to another in the same jakarta can often mean 1-2 hours or more on the road for just a single digit kilometres distance (don't know how the locals can manage this traffic nightmare every day)...
Below the hotel is a Starbucks, and across the road you find E&O restaurant (see reviews). Also there is a cafe in the same compound called Loewy, which is more a bar/restaurant than a cafe, with lively atmosphere (but only so so food). Shops and other hotels including Ritz Carlton and JW Marriott are also just around the corner / in the same large Kuningan circuit.
Pricing for the rooms at Oakwood seem to have recently increased quite a bit, but as long as you can get a decent rate (book early) this is a good choice to stay.
title: My choice in Jakarta

owner_response.text:

Our sniffer dogs are certainly attractive although their primary purpose is as sniffer dogs and they are put through a monthly test which they must pass to stay employed. Mega Kuningan is certainly one of the better areas of Jakarta and as you correctly point out it is well supplied with good places to eat out.

Thanks you once again for your feedback.

Best regards,

Ian McKie

text:
Jakarta is a congested and polluted place without sidewalks. Productivity is greatly reduced by a permanent traffic jam and the absence of public transport. Under these circumstances choosing the right location for your stay is essential. The Oakwood Cozmo is conveniently located in The Central district of Kuningan and supermarkets, shopping malls, convenience stores and good restaurants are within walking distance (5 to 10 minutes) and being Kuningan a fairly newly developed district there are sidewalks or pavements.
We stayed in a one bed studio apartment, quite spacious and composed by bed room, living room with kitchen facilities and bathroom with washing machine and drier. Everything was functioning, the staff was courteous and the price reasonable for the level of facilities and it was inclusive of breakfast.
I would stay there again when visi g Jakarta and, based on my experience I have no doubts to recommend it.

text:
First let's clarify that Oakwood is meant as full service apartment with five stars amenities and location. It serves as this function extremely well and would exceed even the most discerning expectations.  

If time could stand still" describes my thought as we enter our two bedroom suite at Oakwood Jakarta. The suite at this hotel is simply outstanding and exceeded our expectations being immaculately and tastefully designed with modern furnitures and decor. The two bedroom suite is also spacious at more than 1,200 square feet. Oakwood can also serve as long term apartment as it is equipped with fully functioning kitchen, washer/dryer, massive living room, 5.1 surround system and even a butler's quarter. Oakwood is truly the pinnacle of full service apartment living in Jakarta.

We also want to note the location of this hotel being in close proximity to many embassies being just one or two blocks away making this location seems safe and well guarded. There is mini shopping arcade downstairs with coffee shops, restaurants and grocery store. 

Service at this hotel is typical of five stars hotel -  personalized,  effective and prompt. Breakfast is sufficient. 

When compared to a five stars hotel, it lacks is the typical Grand lobby, vast array of breakfast, and a tad less elaborate decor overall. However, Oakwood would handily beat any of them in terms of space and functionality.  Overall -  we are very pleased with Oakwood and definitely would return for our next stay in the capital.
title: Pinnacle of luxury apartment living

owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for your kind comments regarding your recent stay with us.

I believe your description of our facilities exactly sets out what we aim to provide. We are a serviced apartment complex not a hotel and while we may not be as elaborate and ostentatious as a five start hotel we try to deliver personalized friendly service with the advantage of the extra space that apartment living provides. I am pleased that in your particular case we seem to have succeeded. 

Best regards,

Ian McKie.

text:
It feels like my own place.

Modern furniture.
Specious 1 bed rooms suite.
I got everything needed there.
A living room, kitchen with complementary kitchenware to use, dinner table with 2 chairs, a frig and an automatic washing machine in the bath room.
I admire the arrangement of the suite.

After couple days the staff recognize me. The housekeeper Mr Lulus, the securities personal at the hotel gate and waiters in the restaurant.
They were polite and always met me with a smile.

I thank the entire team of oakwood hotel.

They have an outdoor swimming pool. Also, a play room for the kids next to it.

The food was a standard at the breakfast. I didn't even mind not to have my breakfast there. But the quality service of the staff might make that up. 
They need to improve the variety of food service and quality.

The hotel location was just perfect for me.
It locates at the heart of mega kuningan where you will find yourself surrounded with happing and interesting restaurants, cafes, bakery shops, food hall, and walking distance malls.

If you asked me what I didn't like that upon check out I told them that I forget the hotel umbrella at one of our agent office.
They charge for that even though I stayed for a long stay.
I found other hotel gave it away as a complement to their in-house guests.

Any way, if I will ever have a long stay in Jakarta that Oakwood Cozmo premier hotel will be my first choice.

Thank you
title: Long stay during October - November

title: A choice in Kuningan business area

text:
Definitely it should be "Cozy"mo and not just Cozmo. It is a combination of state of the art apartments, pleasant and great team rendering exemplary customer service. I started staying here since September as my work location was next door and was totally floored by the amenities, choice of cutlery and cozy bed. More than this, it is their choice of staff and their attitude towards the guests make it my choice. Eventually, my work location changed and one would be mindful of the traffic in Jakarta and look for accommodation near to work place. But I chose otherwise..i don't mind the traffic nor the time I spend commuting to work...at the end of the day.. I know I have my "home" and that motivates me.. 
I travel every week out of country and get new apartment when I check in. To my surprise, every apartment is the same in terms of the comfort, furnishing which is world class. They have a staff nomination form and I ensure that I recognize the best staff who has given me a wow factor. The management takes it seriously and recognizes their staff which is evident when the nominated staff thanks me for nominating.. a great feeling that I have played a part in recognizing what they deserve. 

Verdict: Definitely a place to stay and you will not regret
title: It should be Oakwood Premier "Cozy"mo :)

text: Great location. Welcoming front desk and friendly staff all around.They even employ sniffer dogs for your security. Room was clean and comfy with all the amenities including a washing machine. Breakfast buffet has everything you could ask for. Swimming pool is on the same level as the restaurant. And there is a gym which I did not use. The hotel has only 10 floors the rest are apartments above so it's a busy place. Starbucks, mini market, and over priced bottle shop on the ground floor. Also Loewy Restaurant is a great place to hang-out grab a quick feed. There's always a flash car parked outside. The hotel could do with a make over as some things look worn out i.e. carpets in the hallways. Windows cleaned and curtains replaced. And I think it's a bit over priced for what you can get else where. Over all I would stay again.

text: Oakwood Premier Cozmo is one of the top places to stay in Jakarta especially if you're staying for a long visit. The rooms are very spacious and ideal for families. The employees are all extremely kind and hospitable. In addition the breakfast at the hotel is also of a high standard. The hotel also offers a premium location, with short drives to nearby shopping malls Plaza Indonesia and Grand Indonesia, as well as Lotte Mall which is walking distance away.

text: A perfect place to stay in Jakarta. Ideally located in the heart of the city the place has multiple eating options around and is a bustling place through the day. text:
This is our 4th stay in the last couple of years at Oakwood Premier, always love coming back and stay here. Nothing beats the location, the surrounding is very up-market, I love the fact that you only need to go downstairs to get food, coffee, even wine and dine! All in the same building...
As we are traveling with 2 young kids (below 7), we always stay at the One bedroom executive unit (one room with king size bed, and another room queen size sofabed)...On our last 3 stays, we were quite lucky to have a good and rather new sofabed, however on our last stay though, we were put in the unit where the sofabed was on the rough and old side...Perhaps next time we will make note on this when booking...My children love the indoor play-area and the pool. Staff are super friendly, and security is good...My boys love the guard dogs!
title: Another great stay

text:
I've visited Jakarta 4 times in the last 12 months and each time I've stayed at the Oakwood because the overall experience is flawless. The rooms are modern, very spacious and the service is on point most of the time. The security is also very good at this hotel, which is very important.

There was a good choice for breakfast, lunch and dinner in the main restaurant plus the room service menu is not bad either. If you want more choice then there are plenty of food choices walking distance from the hotel such as the highly rated Royal Kitchen (Indian) and local food courts and cafe's. There is also Starbuck's attached to the same building as the hotel.

My visits to Jakarta have been for business and I found the location was very good and central for the parts of Jakarta that I needed to travel to.  Also, for business the hotel is very good business meetings and is well known for its professional meeting facilities.
title: Always a good and comfortable experience at Oakwood Cozmo!

text:
At first when I came, the reception told me to wait another 45 minutes to get my 2 bed room unit ready, even though I came 15 minutes before the check in time. But he saw my dissapointed face, he told me that I can wait in another 1 bedroom unit. And I was glad.

The place is great, location is awesome, the 2 bedroom unit is quite spacious, breakfast is good and staffs are really helpfull and friendly.
title: Great experience!
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text:
I stayed in Oakwood during Hari Raya holiday for 4 nights with my family, and we love it.
We stayed in business executive room in 12th floor facing Ritz Carlton hotel (actually there is a construction site, but the site is inactive during holiday). Our apartment has a kitchen,working room, bedroom, bathroom and a dining/living room. It is more than we have expected. 
The kitchen is complete with stove, oven, refrigerator, microwave,coffee maker, toaster...we definitely want to become permanent residence.hahaha.
Since I brought a toddler, a kiddie room is a lovely facility. Even the room is fun, but not really good maintained, as many books already teared up. If they can fix this, it would be lovely.
The breakfast was standard but it was okay, enough for us though.
The swimming pool is not so big but have a sufficient level for adults and kiddos. Good lah..
The staffs were nice to us, and I love their dogs too.
One of the perks of staying in Mega Kuningan area is quiet streets even in the middle of the city. The apartment also have a small supermarket and several restaurants for convenience.
We're definitely will be back for another staycation.
title: a perfect choice for staycation

text: I am very happy to spend the night in this apartment because of the cleanliness maintained , very safe for people who need a private place for resting , I really enjoyed when staying overnight here and i like it

title: Love this place
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text:
While on secondment for work I stayed at the Oakwood Premier Cozmo Jakarta for 120 days over a six month period.  
The rooms are large and my room type had a separate bedroom and living room with a good size kitchenette to comfortably accommodate two people.  
The hotel staff are friendly and for the regular guests will learn your name which is a nice change from staying in other 5 star properties.  The hotel is as older property but in a great part of city that was short trip to my office and had many local facilities.  There is a Ranch supermarket, a Starbucks, a well-known bar “Loewy”, Fitness First and several restaurants at the rear entrance to the hotel.  There are range of restaurants and three shopping areas all within a short walk from the hotel. The foot paths in Mega Kunigan are in good condition but tend to be very slippery when wet so just watch the “shiny” tiles.  There is a good medical centre two blocks from hotel which is always good to know.  The hotel charges in Rupea (IDR) so this is also a nice change from being charged US dollars which you will find with the other upmarket hotels in this area.

Overall I enjoyed my stay and found the hotel met all my needs during my time in Jakarta.  The hotel staff and management were always happy to help no matter what the time of day.
title: 6 months in Jakarta for work, living at Oakwood
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text:

owner_response.text:
Dear Alvin Y.

Many thanks for taking the time to write such a comprehensive review.

I appreciate the kind compliments and would like to address some of your concerns / issues.

Whenever a guest reports some form of disturbance in their room whether from a neighbour, equipment noise or an external source; our 24 hour Customer Service Representatives will instruct our Security Officers to the area of the building concerned, track down the source and action a solution accordingly.

Similarly, we have non-allergenic pillows, duvets and mattress covers available upon request.

With approx. 25 different nationalities in house on any given night, it is our challenge to find breakfast products to suit all. Upon your next visit, or by private message direct to myself, please let me know which of your personal favourites were missing from our selection and we can try them out on our buffet to see if they are popular!

Once again - thanks for the input
Best regards

General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
I have been staying at Oakwood Premier Cozmo Jakarta for work (FIFO) 3 weeks out of 4 for the past five months and have always found the hotel and its staff to be warm and inviting.  After long flights or road trips, checking in is always a great experience when the staff remember your name, which is a nice change from staying in other hotels who take themselves too seriously.  The hotel has the usual high quality facilities you would expect from a serviced apartment in this price range.  The hotel charges in Rupea which is a nice change compared to the other hotels in the local area that charge in US$.

Oakwood is centrally located (Mega Kuningan) and in walking distance to the nearby Lotte, Ambassador and ITC Malls; a Ranch Market onsite and a Fitness First (Oakwood) is next door.  There are several upmarket restaurants and hotels within a short walk if you looking for a change from the in-house dining.  There are also plenty of inexpensive options to chose from in the local area.

Mega Kuningan has a large number of embassies and financial offices with a high focus on security.  I have not had any issues in walking around at day or night and there is visible security at each building.  Just watch the slippery tiles on the footpaths in the local area especially when wet.

Taxis are plentiful if you don’t like to walk and the taxi drivers usually recognise the hotel name and suburb which makes it easy to get home again.  I would recommend you take Google Maps and Google Translate with you if your Bahasa is a little rusty outside the hotel.   Learn how to say Left, right and straight and you should be fine.
title: Home in Jakarta for 6 months - welcome back

owner_response.text:
Dear Patrick_Melb

Many thanks for your comprehensive review. You have pretty much summed up Oakwood Premier and Mega Kuningan (right down to the pavement tiles!).

We are glad you enjoyed your stint here at Oakwood and thanks for the advice about using Google Maps and Translate. My own opinion is to truly understand a city, one must wander around the areas that are off the beaten track and in Jakarta's case, to return the smiles and greetings of those that you encounter in their familiar surroundings.

The smiles and the inquisitive simple English questions for me epitomise the friendliness and outgoing nature of this city's populus. A little Bahasa definitely helps but in most situations a lack of common language is overcome by hand signs and an agreeable demeanour.  

Look forward to welcoming you back in the not too distant future.

Best regards
General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
I was not happy with my stay here. NOT EVEN A TEENY BIT. Don't stay here because you will be completely disappointed like I was.  

I only stayed here because a colleague I was meeting with had an account with Oakwood and he highly recommended it (so that my stay here helps him accrue hotel points and he can use it to have guests stay here for free).  After my experience here, I told all my coworkers to stay somewhere else.  The room rate wasn't any cheaper than what you would pay elsewhere.  My invoice was US$3445.32 for 2 weeks and 3 days ($202.67/night), and I had multiple small misc charges that I had no idea what they were for.  I am definitely NOT coming back here.

Cleaning crew is polite but VERY CARELESS.  They lost my hard contact lenses when they cleaned the bathroom. They don't know English well, I've asked them to not touch anything or any of the bottles on my bathroom counter, they still touched all of them moved things around, in the process they lost my hard contact lenses.  I was upset, my hard lenses are US$600 a pair.  The manager offered to come in to help me find the lenses, really? They've been washed down the pipe already because the cleaning crew had the sink faucet on.  Later that evening, the hotel just said I probably have my contact lenses somewhere else.  Nice try. So I was stuck in Jakarta on biz trip and I could no longer see.  How do I participate in business meetings?  It was really bad, I had to squint my eyes the rest of my trip here, and I had to spend over $600 for a new pair of contact lenses out of pocket because my company wouldn't pay for it and my eye insurance benefits have already been used for my first pair of lenses.

Washer / Dryer unit ruined a couple of my clothes.

Front office staff don't listen to/respect customer wishes.  I was traveling and my time zones have all been screwed up when I arrived in Jakarta.  During the day time I have meetings & during the night I cannot sleep due to more work & jet lag.  Also the Muslim prayer hours starts at 3:30 or 4AM and they would wake me up.  I asked for the hotel to not call my room numerous times.  NUMEROUS TIMES.  I told them I need to catch up on rest & if they need to talk to me, they can send me an email.  They don't listen because they want to wake me up so they could send their cleaning crew in here to clean my room.  One Saturday, I was so exhausted that I couldn't get  to the phone to answer.  I put on head phones and they called for 2 hours straight.  Eventually I answered, furious, and screamed that I need them to let me sleep because I'm jetlagged. Yes it's their daytime on a Saturday, but it's night time where I came from.  I also told them I've told the front desk to not call me a week ago, and I repeated myself 5 times already.  The front desk has noted in my room notes and the staffs don't respect my wishes for some quiet time on weekends.

Yes, the rooms were spacious.  I had a large king bedroom with large closet, a second room for my desk and my shopping bags, a living room, dining room and good sized kitchen all to myself, also a washer dryer in the bathroom.  I had very nice big windows. The view was nice, my colleague's room was also nice, though his faced a construction site.  However, this view you can get at any high rise hotels, so I highly recommend staying elsewhere.

Continental breakfast was included in my room rate. Food was ok, I mean for breakfast I am not picky at all. I'm happy with just two eggs sunny side up. The restaurant staffs would bring food to my room at my request, which was convenient.

Yes, the location is very convenient with restaurants & a grocery store in the same building. However, there are so many other hotels walking distance to this hotel, you can stay at any one of them and receive a much better service.  Generally, Mega Kuningan is a good spot for nice bars, nice restaurants, malls (both affordable and expensive options), close to embassies so if something crazy happens you can walk to your embassy to get help/refuge.  But like I said, there are TONS of other hotels right here in Mega Kuningan, Oakwood is the worst choice.
title: Don't stay here

owner_response.text:
Dear IH,

The review of your stay in August/ September 2014 is much appreciated.

I have re-checked our detailed records on your various issues and whilst i understand your personal upset with regard to your contact lens; the in-depth investigation which was conducted at the time did not come to the same conclusions as yourself.

Obviously, I can empathize with time zone differences and your wish to catch sleep whenever possible, but I also have a responsibility to care for the well-being of my guests and the state of the apartments, (in terms of cleanliness, hygiene and overall condition/appearance). As such, I insist that apartments are visited by our Housekeeping attendants at the very least every three days, ( the norm is daily); for the purpose of clearing garbage; cleaning toilets; replenishing amenities/ toilet paper; replacing towels; and indeed to ensure that the guest is in good health and still occupying the room. When a guest has a "Do Not Disturb" status for several days, we try to call the room before actioning the above visit.

Be assured your colleague's recommendation must have been made on merit because we do not participate in any points based system. Our competitor pricing records show the rate for your  visit, for the 100 Square Meter 1 bedroom suite was in line with the market expectations at that time. 

Once again, I apologise for the inconvenience caused during your stay and thank you for your observations on the property and its adjoining neighbourhood.

Best regards
General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: The hotel is located in an accessible part of the city though there is construction around.  When checking-in, I reminded them of my request for a non-smoking room.  I was curtly told that this is only a request and they cannot guarantee that.  On pushing them, was told that the room type I had booked had no non-smoking rooms left and if I wanted a non-smoking room, I had to pay for an upgrade to a larger room.  I found out that for that room type, there are 88 smoking rooms and only 44 non-smoking rooms.  The check-in assistant was not helpful and insisted that if I wanted to non-smoking room I would have to pay for it.  I finally agreed to it as I was not prepared to spend two nights in a smoking room on a smoking floor. In the midst of her calculating the extra for the two nights, her colleague appeared and after some more discussion, he agreed to the upgrade without any additional charges.  He also apologised that the room they gave me was on a relatively low floor.  As long as it was non-smoking it was fine.  The room was great and was very well presented.  All in all other than the initial inexperience and inaptitude of the initial receptionist, my stay at the hotel was fine.  Just didn't need the stress of an inexperienced person checking you in as it does set the tone for the whole stay.  Also find it incredible in this day and age that there are still hotels that have more smoking rooms around!!!
title: Good accommodation if you are a smoker!

owner_response.text:
Dear PKKC,

As a non-smoker myself, (having lost my father at far too young an age); I fully understand your concerns on being allocated a non-smoking room during your travels.

The Reservations and Customer Service Representative processes should have recognised this preference and the correct allocation should have been made, before your arrival. Unfortunately, as you correctly observed, this was not the case.

To worsen matters, a completely unnecessary dialogue occurred instead of following our standard procedure of ensuring a non-smoker always receives a non-smoking room.

This point has been reinforced with our team.

Our apologies for the mishandling of your arrival and I thank you for bringing this to our attention.

With kind regards
General Manager

text:
This is the 1st time stay @ Oakwood Premier Cozmo and they upgraded me from 1 bedroom Deluxe to 1 bedroom Executive. The 1 BR Executive has a study room and the sofa there can be set up become 1 bed. Even comfy for 2 persons sleeps. 

The front office was VERY Friendly and sincere. They greeted us by name after you check in. 
Stayed in a corner room on 1507  and the room is very spacious with view to Lotte Shopping avenue. The room was big enough and the sofa in living room was very comfortable. The bathroom a little bit small and has no bath tub. Amenities by L'occitane. Extra toilet paper. Enough towels inside. AND they have washing machine for your daily laundry. Very useful.
The bed was great...Super king size 200X200... has another small LED tv inside the room. They have extended electricity plug. Very useful if you need to charge laptops and mobile phone at the same time. Plenty of TV cable channel for your preference 

The kitchen is very complete for eating and even cooking utensils, even I decided to have dinner inside the room instead of spending at the restaurant. We bought the menu from Penang Bistro and eat inside the room since its warmer for family to have dinner together. They even have toaster, coffee maker, and also Rice cooker ... 

Location wise : located at Mega Kuningan area with a lot of restaurants below the apartment building, and has ranch market to buy additional mineral water or maybe has light lunch there. If you want a fancy dinner, just walk to Loewy. 
The security are SO VERY FRIENDLY to guests. They greeted you every time you meet them. 

What I like the most are their services. There's human touch in this property not like other 5 stars hotels or serviced apartments I ever stay at. 

Will Stay here again for sure...
title: Good property SUPERB staff ... Good for value ...

text:
I lived here for three months upon my arrival to Jakarta. One month on my own on a one bedroom apartment and two months with my family in a 3 bedroom one. The location is good, with three different malls at walking distance, restaurants  and a mini market downstairs. The rooms are spacious and are well equipped, the staff is very helpful and try their best to comply with your requirements. Breakfast is very good and varied and the hotel restaurant is also very nice although with limited options. The only downside is that the pool area does not have a lot of space.
Overall I think this is one of the best options for Serviced Apartments in Jakarta

text:
Never tried before so thought I would give it a shot.  Great location right above a mini mall and Loweys diner so super handy. 

However as soon as I walked into the lobby I got that tired feel borderline tatty. Had the usual mental gymnastics with a debit card and deposit.  Room was very large and we'll proportioned however definitely in need of a make over.  Couch looked second hand and worn. Aircon did not work in bedroom but was fixed promptly.  Kitchen is big but like who actually uses? 

The pool is covered in some blue netting I think because of construction but does not make it appealing.  

All up great location but DEFINITELY needs a refurb ( common theme I'm afraid).

text:
When i vist Jakarta I stay here. The reason is simple, good location to business districts, good shops around, supermarket underneath, the apartments are well appointed and maintained and i haven't had a query or issue the staff haven't managed to fix quickly and accurately.

The breakfasts are great, and it is nice after a few days the staff remember you and your preferences for coffee tea and eggs.

text:
Jakarta is a really busy city. It's packed to the brim, traffic is crazy, bikes and people are everywhere and after a day's work, you really just want to hibernate. It gets bright really early, so those curtains were just ticket to a sound sleep.
Also, room dining closes early (maybe 10 or 11pm) but the guys at reception were most helpful in assisting us with our late night hunger pangs and finding us a nice 24 hour pizza delivery restaurant. Thumbs up for amazing service.

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Now this is a GREAT property and I can see why it is ranked as #2.. here's the good and the bad:
Positives:
EVERYTHING apart from the negatives (below)
Great gym. Clean bathroom with great water pressure. Clean everything. Two TVs (bedroom and living room). Windows that open (but they are locked shut so you will need to call up reception for help).

Negatives:
- Wake up call requested for 5am, it came in at 05:10 so careful and plan for a slight delay
- Check out bill was slightly varied to my email confirmation (it was actually lower than the email confirmation so it was to my benefit) but I did point it out to the clerk as I didnt want him penalised by mgmt but do check your bill on check out in case difference is to their benefit, not yours.
- This is a 49-storied building yet i was assigned floor 12. when I complained, the clerk said non-smoking only extends to floor 18. anything higher is smoking. (and this is why i won't be coming back again). I simply refuse to enjoy Jakarta from floor 12 just because I am a non-smoker!! it's smokers who have to ensure low floors with crap views.
- I checked in for the weekend. clerk tells me breakfast ends at 10am. Next morning i read my card key jacket saying breakfast ends at 11am on weekends! So which is it? I ended up not going on the basis that by 10am they were shut.

Again, a GREAT property. Modern, clean and ultra comfortable with a supermarket downstairs open till 10pm however being told that I will never get an apartment beyond floor 18 because I don't smoke is enough to make me go elsewhere. For me view is everything and if I need to smoke to get it then bye bye Oakwood.
title: Totally agree with the high ratings!

owner_response.text:
Dear RAH H,

Many thanks for your review.

I appreciate your positive comments and would like to clarify a couple of points from the "negative" section.

* The elevator buttons go up to 46 floors but after taking out the unlucky "4s" and "13" - the actual number of floors is 38.

Oakwood operates apartments up to floor 32 (with a couple of exceptions on 38) (Elevator ref #). From 23 up the floors have largely 2 and 3 bedroom apartments with only 2  * 1 Bedroom apartments. From 22 down the inverse is true with lower number of 2 and 3 bedrooms and mostly 1 Bedroom apartments. The Customer Service Representative with whom you dealt was correct in stating that no non-smoking rooms were available on higher floors because they had all been reserved. We have non-smoking floors at those higher levels, as well as in the lower sections.

Apologies for the wake up call delay and the Breakfast timing inconsistency - re-training has been actioned for these points.

I appreciate the time taken for reviewing our property.

Best regards
General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: great location, lots of shopping malls nearby accessible by cab (hopefully u are not stuck in a jam). we stayed in a deluxe exec suit that has a living room, study with wardrobe, kitchen where u can even cook and boil water, large king size bed in the bedroom and the toilet came with a washing machine!!! the place is clean, spacious, and had cable TV as well. awesome service from the staff as well!!! Bfast was awesome with a wide variety of food. and a selection of newspapers including Singapore's straits times! im impressed. the service staff remembered my Tea order and proceeded to serve me my tea even without me asking the next day!!!

text:
I have now stayed at the Oakwood on two occasions when in Jakarta for work, both of five nights in duration. It would now be my first choice, when compared to alternative options and taking into account price and location.

The rooms are huge, well appointed and clean. It is also in a great location. At the rear of the building there is a supermarket, that stocks a lot of westerner friendly items. There is also a pharmacy up some escalators, and a fitness first. There is also a great restaurant called Loewy, and across the road, an arguably even better restaurant called E&O. The staff are very friendly and helpful.

I'll definitely be staying again, and now firmly prefer it to the five star hotel options in Jakarta.

title: Great apartment, great staff, great location

text:
It was 2010, when I have first visited Jakarta Indonesia and thought of coming back for a weekend stay for 2 days/1 night and glad I have found myself staying at this amazing serviced apartment-hotel.

Oakwood Cozmo Hotel Jakarta is a luxury serviced apartment that resembles a 5-star hotel in Jakarta, located in the neighborhood of Mega Kuningan, where mostly high-end offices like Embassies are located. And, it is their "One Bedroom Deluxe apartment", an elegant and  sophisticated room that I've stayed, that for other hotels, that could be categorized as an Executive Room or Suite 

Their One Bedroom Deluxe apartment offers all the comforts and conveniences of home, featuring a living room, dining area for two and a king size bedroom with bathroom en-suite. It is better equipped, more functional, more spacious and yet as luxurious as a hotel suite combining Western functionality with exquisite Indonesian design accents. 

During lunch and dinner, I have tried their amazing food at their restaurant, "Oakroom Restaurant & Bar". Their food menus have a wide selection that includes international gourmet classics, local Indonesian and Asian favorites like "Beef Adobo" and "Bento Set", both have an amazing taste and very affordable too. I highly recommends that at least try their amazing food at their restaurant before you check-out at this hotel (though you can cook at their amazing kitchen). And, their breakfast buffet is amazing too, a lot of Asian & Western food they serves.

As an additional information, I've walked around the area, and a lot of shopping malls and establishments nearby. Down at their level 1, there's a grocery store, drug store, even Starbucks Coffee and just 5 mins. walk to the shopping areas where you can enjoy the best of Jakarta can offer. And, they have also a wonderful facilities like swimming pool (outdoor), Fitness gym, Children's play area (if you have kids) and have wi-fi in public areas.

After 2 days/1 night stay and as an Avid Traveler, having been to more than 60 luxurious and five-star hotels, "Oakwood Premier Cozmo Hotel" totally exceeds my expectations. And, if you are looking for a hotel where you can stay longer in Jakarta as a tourist or business traveler,  this apartment- hotel offers the best rates, security and I highly recommends.  

And, the best thing about this hotel, you are totally being taken care of by their wonderful and amazing staff, who are always willing to help with all your request and queries.

NOTE: To know more about my stay here, read my BLOG:

http://olympusgirlinsg.blogspot.sg/2015/04/oakwood-premier-cozmo-hotel-what.html
title: The Best and Only Hotel I Highly Recommends at Jakarta

text: This is my first trip to Jakarta and we only stayed at the Oakwood, so I have nothing else in Jakarta to compare it to.  We stayed (2 Adults and a 6yr old) in a  3 Bedroom Apartment at this Apartment-Hotel, which is leased to my husband through his employers on a 12 month lease as he is based in Jakarta for 3 weeks every month for the next year. So its difficult to give this a value for money rating.  With that context in mind I was very pleased with the Oakwood Apartment we stayed in. It is a quality property, with a lovely front of house and we had a sedately furnished and styled apartment.  Plenty of space with floor to ceiling windows along the north facing side of our apartment which provided plenty of natural light. There is a large dinning table and area, lounge, study, 3 bedrooms, full kitchen, separate laundry, a bathroom and ensuite off Master bedroom with separate Bath, toilet, shower. All of the Bedrooms were large with queen sized beds in the minor rooms and a Super King in the Master. Every bedroom has its own desk and full sized wardrobe, plenty of storage and space. The separate kitchen has a full sized refrigerator with, freezer compartment on top. Full compliment of all kitchen appliances, quality glass wear with red & white wine glasses, beer glasses, high ball glasses, water and short glasses, cutlery, serviettes, serve ware etc. A full sized oven and cook top, microwave, filter coffee machine. There is no dishwasher, although the apartment is serviced every day, so if you don't have time or the inclination to do dishes the very accommodating and friendly house keeping staff will do them for you. Location wise for us it was perfect central to just south of central Jakarta, Plenty of shopping malls within walking distance and short cab ride to others like Plaza Indonesia. In the same complex downstairs is the Lowey Restaurant & Bar, Starbucks a Ranch hood Supermarket, Pharmacy and four or five other restaurant options.  And plenty of other options for eating out within a 5 minute walk. The Oakwood has a reasonable sized pool about 20 meters I'd say which my Son and I frequented most mornings.  It has an area for children and the deeper main pool. There is a children's indoor play room, which is suitable for preschoolers and toddlers, but "too baby" for the 6 yr old (his words).  If it had an xbox or playstation or some gaming station in it he would have been happy to have used it. The Gym at the Oakwood has an assortment of cardio equipment (I didn't see a rower), free weights and weight machines with enough space to do stretches etc. There is also a separate Gym in the same building complex if you wanted more than what is available at the Oakwood guest Gym.  We had a few maintenance issues which were dealt with quickly and efficiently by the staff "engineers". The leaky fridge was replaced within 30 minutes, down lights not working in one bedroom, were fixed by the time we'd returned from lunch. And the front of house staff phoned to check that all issues had been rectified to our satisfaction. The wifi connection was playing up a little and was resolved by the staff setting up new logon accounts for us and it never played up again.  We could hear other people coming and going to the neighbouring apartment, but once they were in their room we couldn't hear them.  All of the staff we found helpful, friendly and accommodating.
title: Great Apartment Hotel stay for 3 weeks

Dear Jean Noël B,

Many thanks for taking the time to review our property and I am happy that you enjoyed your stay.

Our swimming pool currently has protective netting, hawsers and scaffolding in place as a preventive safety measure because of a construction project on the adjoining site. The construction phase is now 99.9% complete but the netting remains until the last few panes of glass are installed - estimated 1 1/2 months. Hopefully our beautiful pool will no longer be "sad" once the netting is removed!

I will take a look at the Gym and see if we can brighten it up; the gray rainy days of the "Monsoon Season" may indeed sadden the atmosphere therein.

I have just checked - we currently have 26 nationalities in house and our intention for breakfast is to try to give a daily changing selection which can appeal across a broad band of tastes. If we were unable to satisfy your breakfast palate on that day, I apologise. If you are returning to Oakwood Premier Cozmo Jakarta - please let our restaurant associates know what food is your preference and we may be able to conjure something up just for you!

Once again - thanks for the input and i hope to welcome you back to the Premier Jakarta soon

Best regards

text:
I've now stayed here multiple times.  The location if superb -- I can see a half-dozen offices from my window where I have meetings.  The rooms are comfortable, spacious (after all, you are living in a serviced apartment), quiet and exceptionally clean and well kept.  The staff is universally friendly and helpful.  Oakwood kept a box of books of mine that I couldn't take for several months:  no charge, no fuss, they re-packed the box when I finally was able to take them with me.  Taxis are readily available.
There is a Ranch Market downstairs -- superb when you want to spend an evening working and channel surfing (and their cable is much better than many others in Jakarta).  There's a Starbucks, an Illy coffee house, a pharmacy, ATM machines (an under-rated advantage) and one of Jakarta's 'happening' restaurants/bars, Loewe.
If you fancy a walk, there are a couple of nearby shopping centers with good restaurants.
Negatives?  The food from the Oakwood eating outlets is only 'so-so'.  Breakfast is fine but for other meals (I often order room service) it's not very exciting.
The price is acceptable.  You know, I have done a number of reviews on Trip Advisor but I'm finding it difficult to fine much wrong with the place.  It is, as I wrote in the title, 'superbly fit for purpose'.
I'm going back to Jakarta in 2 weeks.  Guess where I'll stay?
title: My base in Jakarta - superbly fit for purpose!

Its a very handy hotel/apartment.

The staff are very nice, and the restaurant down stairs does pretty good food. It also has very friendly staff. 

I would stay away from Loewy if your after good food though...they deliver to your room, but the service is pretty shocking. Hit or miss most the time. 

Oh and a major thing..there is a mosquito problem in this hotel. I don't know why, but there were some nights where we were bitten every night. Very random considering we were about the 20th floor.

text:
We booked 7 nights from 6-13 Nov as a family with 2 young kids. We chose this establishment because of the infamous Jakarta traffic and my wife was training in the neighbouring Mariott. Apartment was decent with extensive kitchen equipment to cook proper meals if desired. There is a supermarket, Ranch Market thou expensive, on the ground floor of the establishment. We made some lunches during our stay. Food wise, the restaurant serves decent food and good variety for breakfast. Don't bother trying the restaurants in the complex. Very bad food. You are better off looking for better food in Chiputra World LOTTE MALL. We tried Ninety Nine on the LG level and food was good. It is about 5-10mins walk away. Don't bother taking a taxi in the infamous JAK traffic. The mall has a cinema and children's indoor gym. 
Staff wise, they are exceptionally friendly and helpful. Special mention to Devi during breakfast and Alex of reception. He recommended the skating rink at Taman Angrekk when our original destination, Kidzania was full. Kids had fun. Only blemish is we had two special celebrations, my birthday and our wedding anniversary during our stay. My wife told the reception about it but sadly it did not take the opportunity to wow us. A pity :-( except House keeping did print a bday card and left it in the room. Thks to that!

The apartment also had a kitchen which was of no use to me as I was travelling for 2 days in Jakarta. The restaurant is less than ordinary and plain and in simple word it’s not good. owner_response.text:
Dear Meenakshii0629,

Many thanks for taking time out to review the Oakwood Premier Cozmo Jakarta. It would seem we were unable to tick several of your boxes when selecting accommodation in Jakarta.

Mega Kuningan, with it’s central location in the so-called “Golden Triangle”,  suffers similar traffic woes to nearly all parts of Jakarta and “Macet” is the primary topic of conversation when there is more than a gathering of two people. Infrastructure development is coming with the onset of the new MRT project but completion, unfortunately will be several years away. As a collective, hoteliers all around the city are hoping the newly elected Government is listening to your comments and that of all the other travellers and residents of Jakarta. 

Oakwood is an international serviced apartment company which, in many locations in the Asia Pacific region,  provides accommodation to not only extended stay visitors but with the same 24 hour services as a hotel - at Front Desk, Security, Housekeeping, Laundry and Maintenance – we are also popular with guests visiting for shorter stays. As you correctly observed our Team of well-trained hospitality professionals strive to provide the Oakwood Gold Standard of Service. We have been humbled by the gratitude expressed, (through TripAdvisor, Guest Appreciation letters and Customer Survey feedback), by individuals and families, both visitors for long and short stays (about 25% of our guests); for leisure or business purposes; representing countless companies, embassies and NGOs, who have enjoyed their experience at the Oakwood, the Mega Kuningan neighbourhood and Jakarta, in general.

If you have the time, I would like to hear the specifics of the issues you encountered when you visited our restaurant; in order for me to review and re-train/emphasise, where necessary. (csr.cozmojakarta@oakwoodasia.com – FAO M Hines, GM). Our extensive menu, for a la carte or room service dining, offers both International and Indonesian favourites and tries to cater to as many varying tastes as possible. Similarly, the Breakfast Buffet has a plethora of options.

Many of our guests, enjoy the additional space that our 1 bedroom “suite” configurations afford them; (@70 SqM or 100 SqM; compared to an average 5 star hotel of circa 38-43 SqM) and use the kitchen’s extensive equipment and facilities to make their stays more personal. 

The Fitness Center is measured at 310 SqM and is equipped with renown “Life Fitness” equipment that includes, but is not limited to, 5 Treadmills, Smith Machine, 2 Cycles, 1 Cross Trainer, various strength machines and, of course, free weights.

The neighbouring Noble House development is 98% complete, the building fully glazed and  while the remaining landscaping and driveway/ car park works will take a few more months to complete; that side of the building offers fully tripled glazed bedrooms for a comfortable night’s sleep.

Once again, I am sorry we have been unable to satisfy your expectations on this occasion and please let us know if you are coming to Jakarta again in the near future.

Sincerely yours
M Hines
General Manager

text:
My partner and I stayed at Oakwood Premier Cozmo for a little over 5 weeks and we enjoyed every single second of our stay! The staff was what really made the place exceptional. They were always very friendly and helpful (right from the guard dogs to the security guards to the front desk and restaurant staff). Any request was met and they always did it with a smile.

The room themselves were very well cleaned (which is a definite must for me at any hotel) and comfortable. We stayed in a 1 bedroom deluxe for our entire stay and we did not have one thing to complain about. The fact that you have a kitchen and washing machine to do laundry is really helpful when you are staying more than a couple of days.

The location was also very easy for us to get to and from work, as well as to any of the major shopping malls. We made good use of Lowey and the Ranch Market which were really great alternatives after a long day at work. 

I highly recommend Oakwood! It's a must place to stay in Jakarta and really makes your Jakarta experience just that much better. We are sad we had to leave after our stint but would not hesitate to stay again if we had to!!

text: Had a wonderful time at the Oakwood.  The staff was attentive and friendly. Complimentary breakfast buffet was sufficient.  Quiet and well stocked for all diets.  Made-to-order omelette station is a nice touch.  Quality was average, but no complaints when it's free!  Loewy's restaurant/lounge in the back is popular with the locals; a hip spot to grab a bite or a drink.

I recently stayed here for an extended business trip of two months. 

The quality of the accomodation is excellent. The rooms are very large, comfortable and  spotlessly clean. The TV is huge and the wi-fi is fast. I particularly appreciated having a well equipped kitchen with a proper oven.

The location is quite close to the centre of town, although the vicinity does get snarled with traffic. Do note that taxi drivers generally do not know where to find this place - make sure to carry the hotel's business card with you.

The breakfast buffet is not great but it is passable. Downstairs there is a small supermarket and a few restaurants. It takes 5-10 minutes to walk to the nearby shopping malls.

text:
I wanted to find another hotel in Jakarta that was closer to the Mega Kuningan area and cheaper. Thanks to TripAdvisor, I found the almost perfect one! 

The reviews were very helpful and indeed, this hotel is absolutely value for money! The room is just not a room, but an apartment suite. It has a fully-equipped kitchen, a fantastic living room and a very spacious room. 

From the moment of arrival, I was instantly recognized by the staff. They made me felt welcome, and check-in was a breeze. In the room, the big bed was inviting and sleep quality was first class. The wardrobe was well organized with plenty of room to store my weeks' clothes. The bathroom is very well-stocked and even has a full front loading washing machine, in case I need to do laundry. 

Breakfast was included, and again, friendly service all the way. 

When I compare to my previous hotel, this is absolutely heaven-class! Way, way better!

text:
I recently stayed at the Oakwood Cozmo Jakarta for several months while I was commuting to Indonesia on a work assignment.  Overall in Jakarta if you are looking for a hotel or serviced apartment, then your main consideration needs to be location, and being as close to your office as possible, to minimise inconvenience from the traffic, so if you need to be near the Mega Kuningan area, then I strongly recommend the Oakwood.  

I was in the most basic of apartments (1 bedroom) on a low floor and the standard of facilities and layout of the apartment was excellent, pretty much everything had been thought of, the kitchen was fully equipped, as was the bathroom/laundry.  All appliances were modern and worked well and if there was ever a problem, then maintenance fixed it with minimal hassle.  I would try to get on a higher level floor as I was just above the restaurant and I could often hear rattling from the aircon and vibrations from the kitchen, but maintenance did manage to sort it out fairly promptly.  The only downside I can see is that the windows do not open to air out the apartment, so in my apartment the aircon needed to be left on at all times, otherwise you got musty smells from the shower.  My personal preference is to minimise aircon use and get air from outside, so it was mildly annoying, but if this not an issue for you then it should not be a concern.  I did visit other serviced apartments around the area and they all seemed to have sealed windows, so probably just standard in Jakarta and something to live with.  

The front desk were generally very good and responsive, some staff of course were better than others, and managed to go out of their way to help, providing spare phone chargers, arranging transport with minimal notice at odd hours etc., additionally the security personal are very friendly.  When you arrive, the staff make sure that you are settled in and know how to get around town, what is in the area and provide general advice in living in Jakarta.  

There is a supermarket in the same building as well as several casual restaurants in the building as well as a few bars popular with the expat and Indonesian crowd.  Several very decent shopping malls are within walking distance, and depending on traffic conditions, it can be anything from 10 minutes to 1 hour drive to Pacific Place or Grand Indonesia. 

All in all, it is one of the better serviced apartments I have stayed in globally and if I was back in Jakarta and needed to be near Mega Kuningan, I would stay there again with no hesitation.
title: Excellent Serviced Apartment in Jakarta

text:
I have been staying at the Oakwood in Jakarta on and off for the last ten months and the service is always exceptional - very friendly & helpful staff, in addition to the very well appointed rooms.
On this particular occasion, I had flown from Australia to Singapore then caught a connecting flight to Jakarta. My luggage made it only as far as Singapore. 
Upon arriving at the Oakwood, I explained the situation to the staff at the front desk and they immediately offered to assist with contacting the airline to follow up on the whereabouts of my luggage. Throughout the day, I had the front desk staff offering to go out and buy me some more clothes as it was still uncertain as to when my luggage might appear. 
To top all efforts, I had a phone call from the General Manager offering to lend me some of his own clothes - in the end he sent up an Oakwood t-shirt (very nice too!) for me to wear in the evening.
This attention to customer service went way beyond what could have been reasonably expected - it is this sort of thing which makes it a pleasure to keep coming back to this Oakwood.
Good effort everyone, much appreciated!
(my luggage finally turned up the next day)
title: Beyond call of duty

text: I stay at Oakwood every time I come to Jakarta. It's more cost efficient as the "rooms" are actually apartments that come with a fully equipped kitchen. owner_response.text:
Ruoz

Many thanks for your review and I am glad to hear you enjoyed your stay. 
The Ranch Market in the retail area of the Oakwood building stocks many different fresh meat, fish, fruit and vegetable items as well as a large selection of groceries.  As you correctly point out - when coupled with the Oakwood apartment kitchen and equipment, a guest can rustle up meals from simple snacks to cordon bleu offerings! 
If the line of least resistance/effort is sought; as well as the restaurants in the retail area, our Oakroom restaurant on the third floor offers a cosmopolitan menu and an In-room dining option also. 
The surrounding buildings in the Mega Kuningan circle have an eclectic array of dining options. 
If you are an I-Phone/ Ipad user - download Oakwood's "Neighborhood App" and check out a few of those options. We would value your review of some of those restaurants / cafes if you are returning to Jakarta.

text:
I had a pleasant stay at Jakarta. Except for the Traffic which used to take around 1  to 2 hours from office to work and vice versa.

I will definitely recommend stay at Oakwood premier apartment alone or with family. Good lighting , GYM, clean , breakfast was average for a vegetarian like me. However compensated by the supermarket and cooking facilities in the apartment and nearness of an indian restaurant which is just opposite to the apartments.
